view

Class TextButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • view.Button
        • view.TextButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GUI.LoadGame, GUI.NewGame, GUI.SaveGame, GUI.ScoresButton

    public abstract class TextButton
extends Button
    Acts like a regular Button, however it is also tied to a Text object. Used to make a lot of similar buttons that just have a different label.
    Author:
    Tadas

    • Field Detail

      • text

        Text text

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextButton

        public TextButton(Text t,
          java.lang.String imageName,
          int posX,
          int posY,
          int width,
          int height)
        Initializes the button.
        Parameters:
        t - Text object to be tied with this button.
        imageName - file name of the image. It will be stored as an AnimatedRenderable with 3 frames internally and the image itself should reflect that.
        posX - position of the top left corner of the image representing the button
        posY - position of the top left corner of the image representing the button
        width - width of the button
        height - height of the button
